skillTree.localised_description: An excellent steed barded in stylish burnished steel, for the man that must not ask "Eh?".

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Fly on your wings, fly, and touch the sun.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: An exotic beast, the demigryph, mighty dangerous too. Whoever intends to tame and befriend one must be strong of will and limb, because even the best suits of plate are not demigryph-proof.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos Worshippers and mutants are anathema to everything sacred. Cutting them to ribbons is the first step towards purity.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A brilliant mind in a brilliant body, and both seem impossible to destroy.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Strike hard, strike true.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Every move is perfectly choreographed, as if it were a dance… a dance of death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
The troops are led to amazing feats of bravery by the mere confidence of being guided by Myrmidia and one of Her skillful warriors.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: In a flash of polished armour and shiny robes, the Templar strikes fast and deadly.
Warrior Priests of Myrmidia are master tacticians known in the whole Old World.
As the Templar’s troops come out of seemingly nowhere, the enemies scream his infamous name in frustration.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The Templar’s mind is an incessant flow of tactical diagrams and pressure point markers.
The Templar’s righteousness is completely out of question, which is understandably uncommon.

Behind the erudite mask of this Myrmidian commander lies the untamed spirit of a warrior. In battle, his arms glare of such a violent and supernatural light that even the untainted cannot stare for long.

effects.description: Enables Champion stance, with shield, ward save and blinding attacks

Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)
Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Beastmen, Daemons, Norsca and Warriors of Chaos

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Don't ask them about living on the edge. Or huge green things with teeth.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +5% for all units (Rank 4 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A commoner was once asked by a foreign recruiter about a band of Estalian mercenaries. Shrugging, he replied that they were "evil men", which was misunderstood as being 'local' for tough troops. Like many mistranslations, it stuck.

effects.description:
All damage: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Tileans are an odd bunch, known to fight to the last for the most disparate reasons: their ideals, their captain, their regiment, their purse, a painting.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Broken Lances, Noble Retinue and Knights Encarmine (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Pikemen and Half-Pikes (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for all crossbow units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: +5% for Pikemen, Half-Pikes, Broken Lances, Noble Retinue, Knights Encarmine and all crossbow units
	(Lord's army)
effects.icon: BUGGED FOR XP UNIT SETS, HAPPENS BY DEFAULT, INTENDED

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Well, this is straightforward enough.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +2 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Oh wait, there's another chapter.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +2 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the lousiest commander knows that you need two halves of a pair of scissors.

Leadership: +2 for hand weapon, pike and halberd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +3 for spear, lance and great weapon units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Duck! Shoot! Duck! Shoot! Shoot- shoot, that was wrong.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +3% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +6% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +10% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The key is not letting your initiative depend on a lucky die.
It's seldom enough to have only some of your troops to be ready to take a beating. The enemy has their own plans.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You kill them before they kill you, sonnie. That's all it is."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Though of course, if they do stab you, you better know how to parry."

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Plus, you better kill them dead with the one shot you have."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "And to do that, it helps if you put all your weight where it counts."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +2% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Look, at the end of the day, you may be alive and you better learn from what didn't kill you."

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "I shall wear midnight... and many knives."

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This man can easily distinguish between an ancient elven magical sword of implacable might and a piece of shiny iron, which is not so simple when the artifact itself is in that disguise.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You know you're doing it right when everyone and their mamas are sending people to stab you."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: Renowned among their allies and feared by enemies both mortal and otherwise, this Lord's every deed adds to their already legendary reputation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This particular Knight was favoured with unanimity by the oracles of the Order of True Insight. That must have been expensive.
In his training or previous command, this Templar has distinguished himself against the heathens. Bretonnian allies still have fond memories of him.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +15 with Thegan's Errantry, Knights of the Flame, Knights of Origo and Jerrod's Errantry

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Respect the prisoners of war", says one of the major Myrmidian strictures. So this man does, honour and dignity above all. And tactical benefits.
The wrath of Bellona Myrmidia rides this Templar's arm and strikes the impure with blazing might!
